Row.Text: [BLIST][LI]When any Leader [B]Excavates[/B] an [B]Artifact[/B] in the Ottomans’ territory, they generate an additional [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] [B]Artifact[/B].[LI][B]+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength[/B] for [B]Infantry and Siege Units[/B] when attacking.[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Sultanahmet Camii[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Ottomans’ associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.

When any Leader [B]Excavates[/B] an [B]Artifact[/B] in the Ottomans’ territory, they generate an additional [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifact. +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Infantry and Siege Units when attacking.
